verbs.description: Jackson [V: has] served as the White House physician for the past three presidential administrations . President Donald Trump nominated him to run the VA in March .
[ARG0: Jackson] has [V: served] [ARG1: as the White House physician for the past three presidential administrations] . President Donald Trump nominated him to run the VA in March .
Jackson has served as the White House physician for the past three presidential administrations . [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: nominated] [ARG1: him] [ARG2: to run the VA in March] .
Jackson has served as the White House physician for the past three presidential administrations . President Donald Trump nominated [ARG0: him] to [V: run] [ARG1: the VA] [ARGM-TMP: in March] .
